name: Spiaggia vicino Roma 4
description:
Ladies' wedge.
Beach near Rome, Italy
29 June 2016

A woman walks, sun to the south west, the breeze in her face, Lorenzo in her thoughts. Hiding in the sand, first one shoe, then another, and another.
By afternoon's end four EU citizens are mourning their loss.  By evening's tide the ocean reclaims them all.

-----

The Lost Shoe Project brings together participants from around the world, in a performance piece documented in close-to-real-time as a sequence of photographic images of lost or abandoned shoes. The Collector presents this first array of his most loved images.
